Package com.mathmaster13.fynotek

Class OldFynotekWord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mathmaster13.fynotek.FynotekWord
      • com.mathmaster13.fynotek.OldFynotekWord
  • public class OldFynotekWord
extends FynotekWord
    A class for handling words in an older version of Fynotek.

      • isValidSequence

        public static boolean isValidSequence​(java.lang.String sequence)
        Returns whether the given sequence is phonotactically and orthographically valid in old Fynotek. Capitalization is ignored (for example, "A" and "a" are treated the same way). Multiple words can be separated by whitespace, and this function will only return true if all words in sequence are valid. Leading and trailing whitespace is ignored. A sequence containing punctuation marks, numbers, or other non-letter characters (with the exception of ') returns false, as well as an empty sequence or one containing only whitespace.
        Parameters:
        sequence - the sequence to be checked for validity.
        Returns:
        true if sequence is a valid sequence, and false if otherwise.
